snippet: Summer in the Hamptons just hasn't been the same this year for Jon S. Corzine, the former MF Global chief executive, with his social calendar noticeably bare, according to The New York Post.
abstract: Summer in the Hamptons just hasn't been the same this year for Jon S. Corzine, the former MF Global chief executive, with his social calendar noticeably bare, according to The New York Post.

headline.main: Jon Corzine, Down and Out in East Hampton
